name: Bad Driver 3D_
description:
I Made This Game in 32 Minutes There is Main Menu And The Game But There Isn't Any Game Over Menu So When You Fall You Have To Close The Full Game With Alt+F4 or from Task Manager. We Are Sorry For Not Doing A Game Over Menu Its Still Early Access But When We Have Time For Updates We Will Update it. You Can Suggest Us Ideas For What To Put In The Game.
Join Our Discord Community: Discord
